column4: can anyone tell me why the xubuntu screen comes back to the login screen even after i've typed in the password....keeps happening again and again
can anyone tell me why xubuntu is coming back to the login screen even after i've typed in the password....keeps happening again and again
The most common cause for that is that permissions in your home directory got screwed up from default user to root (usually by running a graphical app with "sudo" instead of "gksudo" )
